title: Technical Program Manager, Data Processing
description: A problem isn’t truly solved until it’s solved for all. Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone. Google is committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion, and building a Google for everyone.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related field. 2 years of experience leading cross-functional projects. 2 years of experience in program management.
preferred_qualifications: Ability to communicate effectively. Design process improvements tailored to projects. People management and problem-solving skills.
responsibilities: 1. Develop and align project priorities and schedules. 2. Manage interdependent projects across global team. 3. Exercise independent judgment and develop recommendations. 4. Design operational processes to help scale. 5. Implement dashboard solutions for effective program management.
